de.susebox.jtopas
Interface SeparatorHandler

All Superinterfaces:
Plugin
Deprecated. replaced by the new SeparatorHandler interface

public interface SeparatorHandler
extends Plugin

This interface must be implemented by classes that should be used as a separator handler plugin in the PluginTokenizer.

This interface is deprecated. Use the new SeparatorHandler interface instead.

Author:
Heiko Blau
See Also:
Tokenizer, AbstractTokenizer
